steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital: Case 5-2014: 2014: A 
59-year-old man with fever, confusion, thrombocytopenia, rash, and renal 
failure.
Baggett MV, Turbett SE, Schwartzenberg SS, Stone JR.

A 59-year-old man was admitted to this hospital because of fever, confusion, 
rash, thrombocytopenia, and renal failure, 10 days after a hunting trip in the 
Nevada valley. Diagnostic procedures were performed, and diagnostic test results 
were received from another hospital.
